article.title: InterSense Receives U.S. Air Force Phase I SBIR Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: InterSense Incorporated has received a Phase I SBIR contract from the U.S. Air Force to develop and deliver a wireless, networkable motion sensing system that will track and report the location of soldiers and devices in augmented reality training applications. The tracking solution will monitor multiple users and devices with limited reference infrastructure.
